## SimpleType class

Implementation for simple types such as primitive types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SimpleType<ResultType> extends BaseTypeImpl<ResultType>
```

<b>Extends:</b> [BaseTypeImpl](./types.basetypeimpl.md)<!-- -->&lt;ResultType&gt;
